overview: In the gay community, fetishes often lead to surrogate families. WOOF: A Barkumentary looks at how the fetish 'pup play,' where people dress as dogs, can help gay men find families, explore what relationships mean and why it's important to find a home among friends and lovers. But the fetish can also lead to abuse, if precautions aren't taken.
title: Woof: A Barkumentary
